channel.title: Install anon-apps-config on Whonix-Gateway by default?
channel.description:
https://github.com/Whonix/anon-apps-config
pros:
* [ping capability hardening](https://github.com/Whonix/anon-apps-config/blob/master/etc/permission-hardening.d/30_ping.conf) * see what else it does: https://github.com/Whonix/anon-apps-config#anonymity-privacy-and-security-settings-pre-configuration * useful for [UniStation](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/UniStation)
cons:
* have to keep in mind during development it is also installed by default on Whonix-Gateway, therefore could not add dependencies there * extraneous (confusing for reviewers) files in Whonix-Gateway * does things in Whonix-Gateway which don't apply to it (such as [tox.ini](https://github.com/Whonix/anon-apps-config/blob/master/etc/skel/.config/tox/qtox.ini)) * but apart form that does no harm
